name: Myron Butler
description: '''Myron Demond Butler''' (born July 27, 1974) is a [[gospel music]]ian, record producer, singer-songwriter, music director, vocalist, organist and pianist.  Most notably, he is known as the leader of the gospel choir, [[Myron Butler & Levi]]. Since 1997, he's worked as a [[music director|vocal director]] and backup singer for several notable artists to include [[Kirk Franklin]], Marvin Sapp, [[Smokie Norful]], [[Donald Lawrence]], and [[Yolanda Adams]].
